entry.title: 编程范式
entry.content: graph TD    A[编程范式] --> B[命令式编程<br/>Imperative Programming]    A --> C[声明式编程<br/>Declarative Programming]        B --> D[过程式编程<br/>Procedural Programming]    B --> E[面向对象编程<br/>Object-Oriented Programming]        C --> F[函数式编程<br/>Functional Programming]    C --> G[逻辑式编程<br/>Logic Programming]    C --> H[响应式编程<br/>Reactive Programming]        style A fill:#e1f5fe    style B fill:#fff3e0    style C fill:#f3e5f5    style D fill:#e8f5e8    style E fill:#fff8e1    style F fill:#fce4ec    style G fill:#e0f2f1    style H fill:#f1f8e9
